SEARCH:
Package de.presti.ree6.addons

Klasse AddonLoader

java.lang.Object
de.presti.ree6.addons.AddonLoader
public class AddonLoader extends Object
The actual Addon-Loader which Loads every single Addon from the Addon Folder.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Modifizierer
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    private
    AddonLoader()
    Constructor should not be called, since it is a utility class that doesn't need an instance.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • AddonLoader

      private AddonLoader()
      Constructor should not be called, since it is a utility class that doesn't need an instance.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalStateException - it is a utility class.

  • Methodendetails

    • createFolders

      private static void createFolders()
      Create the Folder if not existing.

    • loadAllAddons

      public static void loadAllAddons()
      Load every Addon.

    • loadAddon

      public static Addon loadAddon(String fileName) throws IOException
      Actually load a Addon.
      Parameter:
      fileName - Name of the File.
      Gibt zurück:
      a Local-Addon.
      Löst aus:
      IOException - If it is an invalid Addon.

    • getClass

      private static Class<?> getClass(URLClassLoader classLoader, String classPath) throws ClassNotFoundException
      Get the Addon Class from the Class-Loader and its path.
      Parameter:
      classLoader - the Class Loader of the File.
      classPath - the Path to the Main class.
      Gibt zurück:
      the Main class of the Addon.
      Löst aus:
      ClassNotFoundException - if there is no file with the given Path.
